original_text:
To you, Lord, I call,
    for fire has devoured the pastures in the wilderness
    and flames have burned up all the trees of the field.
korean_text: 여호와여 내가 주께 부르짖으오니 불이 목장의 풀을 살랐고 불꽃이 들의 모든 나무를 살랐음이니이다

sentences.original_text: for fire has devoured the pastures in the wilderness
and flames have burned up all the trees of the field
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 불길이 밭의 모든 나무를 태워버렸습니다
